short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that provides various tools for debugging the LivePerson web messaging experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a developer tools panel that empowers the user to monitor and debug the LivePerson web messaging experience in the following ways:

- Is "Web Tag detected"?: Detects and displays whether the current webpage is tagged with the LivePerson Web Tag for web messaging/chat
- Displays the current LivePerson account ID and associated environment
- Dashboard: view the current LivePerson account ID, environment, and component versions
- CSP (Content Security Policy): run a test to uncover CSP compliance/compatibility issues with the LivePerson web messaging/chat
